casebody.data:
First Department,

July, 1980

(July 3, 1980) Arnott-Bennis, Inc., Respondent-Appellant, v Adam Arnott et al., Respondents-Appellants.

Order, Supreme Court, New York County, entered on January 22, 1980, unanimously affirmed on the opinion of Wallach, J., at Special Term, without costs and without disbursements. Concur— Murphy, P. J., Kupferman, Markewich and Silverman, JJ.
